EmailTemplate.subject: Application to Close Company
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Companies House
Application to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
{!Transaction__c.PresenterName__c}
Your application to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c} has been successfully submitted.
Your Reference number is {!Transaction__c.SubmissionId__c}
What to do next
Once the application has been submitted you will receive an email containing the submitted application. It is the director’s responsibility to ensure that copies of the application have been sent to all notifiable parties by {!Today()+30}. This includes:
Creditors Employees Shareholders Pension managers or trustees
Please check the guidance notes for more information on the process click here.
Failure to notify interested parties is an offence. It is advisable to obtain and retain some proof of delivery or posting of copies to notifiable parties.
Click to download a copy of your application
Withdrawal of striking off application by a company
